title: Floral Cascade Diamond & Gemstone Dangle Earrings
materials: Emerald Beads. Features a Hyderabadi polish for a rich luster.
features: These exquisitely designed dangle earrings feature a delicate floral cascade. The design incorporates pear shaped diamond drops and is interspersed with ruby and emerald beads. The diamond accents are beautifully set in what appears to be leaf-like forms, adding a modern touch to the design.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings
and cultural celebrations. Its unique design will add sophistication to your look.
description: These earrings represent a blend of modern design with traditional gemstone color palettes, making them perfect for the woman who appreciates the past but embraces the future. Their unique shape and gemstone colors make them a highly versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance.
